solution_line_template: After giving away 4/5 of the cupcakes, Anna has {total_cupcakes} / {remaining_fraction_denominator} = <<{total_cupcakes}/{remaining_fraction_denominator}={remaining_cupcakes_after_giving_away}>>{remaining_cupcakes_after_giving_away} cupcakes

After eating {eaten_cupcakes} cupcakes, Anna has {remaining_cupcakes_after_giving_away} - {eaten_cupcakes} = <<{remaining_cupcakes_after_giving_away}-{eaten_cupcakes}={cupcakes_left}>>{cupcakes_left} cupcakes.
